spirit:component.spirit:name: xilinx_mac10g

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: rx_clk_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: 156.25MHz output clock used for receive-side logic

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: tx_clk0_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: 156.25MHz output clock used for transmit-side logic

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include Shared Logic in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The 10 Gigabit Ethernet Media Access Controller (XGMAC) LogiCORE provides a 32-bit Ten Gigabit Media Independent Interface (XGMII) to provide up to 10 gigabits per second (Gbps) total bandwidth. Operating with an internal clock speed of 156.25MHz, the core supports LAN/WAN mode operation and is designed to the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard specification. In addition, it provides support for VLAN and JUMBO frames . It also provides optional network management features including statistics gathering and flow control. The core can be configured and monitored through a AXI Streaming interface. In addition, the core is designed to seamlessly connect to the XAUI LogiCORE, RXAUI LogiCore and the 10-Gigabit Ethernet PCS/PMA via the XGMII interface.
